Full-back Lo Kwan-yee points out that Sun Bus Yuen Long excels by playing a team-oriented style, with players often high in spirits. The combination has led to some surprising results for the New Territories side this season and Kitchee must be prepared for a potentially stiff challenge.

“Despite sitting in the middle of the premier league table, Sun Bus Yuen Long often causes a lot of surprise simply by playing its hearts out, therefore we must be fully switched on during the battle,” Lo stated ahead of the game.

“Entering the final premier league fixture of the season, although Kitchee already has the league title in the bag, yet players who have not seen a lot of game-action this season still want to seize the opportunity to prove themselves on the pitch, hence there is no questioning on our motivation for this game whatsoever.”
